title: Is that ward skin worth something ?

embed.description: Riot Fist Symbol Riot Games Riot Games Logo Riot Fists Angry Riot Fist Drawn Riot Games Fist Socialist Fist Flag Riot Fist Logo Riot Fest Chicago 2013 Riots 2013 Hilarious Riot The Replacements Riot Fest Riot Fest Circus Atmosphere Riot Fest Riot Festival Chicago 2013 Fall Out Boy Riot Fest Chicago 2013 Taking Back Sunday Riot Fest 2013 Riot Crowd Fist

replies.body: Pls Read Art. 4 of the TOU
But still some are selling those codes for about 20 - 50€. Depends on the server. EUW is about 45€. So its not really common but you'll see some over the years.
Define worth something. Its a cool skin, they usually distribute codes to those who attend Riots events. SInce there have been quite many of those over the time quite a lot of people have it by now.
